div.p: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?
Saturday, I just earned 1 million euros at the belgian lotery. And do you know what ? It isn't enough !

Half of the money is for my wife and I think she will be happy to go 2 weeks in thalasso at Spa. After, she intends to have a trip in Paris and London for shopping. And I suppose, she'll buy a new car : she saw in Brussel show cars a pretty Fiat 500.
I'll give 200000 euros to my son and 200000 euros to my daughter.
I want to buy a flat in spain but the price is 120000.
As I said, one million is not enough !
